article_node.title: This Zach Cregger horror is one of the best Netflix movies leaving this month (August 2025)
article_node.summary: The article warns that several popular Netflix titles will soon leave the service and recommends alternatives such as Sicario, 17 Again, and other films across Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, HBO Max, and Disney+. It also includes brief synopses and reviews of a wide range of movies—from thriller and horror to comedy and drama—and offers guides to the best new releases on each streaming platform. Additionally, it reports on the death of actor Matthew Perry and highlights his most notable roles. The piece serves as a comprehensive movie‑watching guide for the month’s streaming options and recent film releases.
